lead_paragraph: Jimbo Fisher will succeed Bobby Bowden as Florida State’s next coach — someday. Bowden, who has the most victories in major college football, has agreed to a deal for next season, his 33rd, with options to stay longer. But T. K. Wetherell, the university president, designated Fisher, the offensive coordinator, as “head-coach-in-waiting,” then skipped out of a somewhat unusual news conference without answering questions about the contracts, which are not yet completed.
